title: Ancient Blade (7U15)
text:

Kind:	Free People

Game Text:	Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Ancient Blade.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and reconcile your hand.
